pullRequest.title: HBASE-24974: Provide a flexibility to print only row key and filter for multiple tables in the WALPrettyPrinter
pullRequest.bodyText: Provide flexibility to print only row key from WALPrettyPrinter and filter for multiple tables in the WALPrettyPrinter

commit.message: HBASE-24974: Provide a flexibility to print only row key and filter for multiple tables in the WALPrettyPrinter

nodes.bodyText: nit: "Only lof entries for these tables..."
nit: for clarity, shouldn't we name it as tableSet instead of tableList? Or maybe better to use List/ArrayList.
Is HashSet really needed here? Can this be a simple ArrayList?
Let's be more direct: "Prints only row keys".

This can be replaced with:
    Collections.addAll(tableList, tableListWithDelimiter.split(","));

Looks like this efficient search with contains() is the reason behind using Set instead of List.
Btw, (TableName) is redundant cast here.
+1, and this should be final too.
nit: I think the second condition covers the first one.
